Necross/ Wolfblade:
 
"Why?  He is obviously tearing our unity apart.  We must remain united!  If he has to go, then so be it!" Necross shouted.
 
Wolfblade turned her rifle on Necross.
"Back off ugly!" she shouted, deadly serious.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Blacknightmare:

"Get OUT THIS NECROSS!!!!! WHY DON?T YOU SHOT THE 
CCANNON!!!!!"shouted angered the femme


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> OOC:  Splattercannon is fighting Hydras.  Necross was waiting for 
such an oppertunity to show himself.
>  
> Necross:
>  
> "Well, look at all the trouble your pet has caused you.  For the 
good of Unicron, I'll have to destroy him.  Say goodbye to him," 
Necross said, levelling his missile blaster.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Blacknightmare
> 
> BlackNightmare tought carefully the vermon would knoc her out 
soon, 
> Where was Nightstrike, Darkfate, Scattercannon and the others when 
> they were needed?
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice/ Wolfblade:
> >  
> > "Just... shut up.  I can proccess that venom, then we can get 
you 
> out of here."
> > Malice struggled to remain awake, his energy levels were barely 
> registering.  
> > "Hold it you two," Wolfblade said, standing and aiming her rifle 
> at them.  "You arn't going anywhere.  You both are my prisoners," 
> the femme said, trying to hold back her emotions.
